file_content.text: The Wrath seeks a quick victory. Turn his impatience to your advantage.
Do not let the Wrath triumph!
Stop the Wrath, Nataya. Draw on everything I've taught you!
The Wrath hungers for a swift victory. Turn her impatience to your advantage.
Concentrate, Nataya. Anticipate the Wrath's every move.
Zujen was right--your power is even stronger than anticipated.
Nataya was my finest apprentice. She will be long remembered for giving her life to ensure the Emperor's downfall.
I'm coming for you, Gnost-Dural.
You're next.
I will await you at the Emperor's graveside.
More Jedi will perish if you don't release the Hand now.
Last chance to surrender.
Such is the cost of peace.
Your apprentice gave her life for a victory you'll never achieve.
She died for nothing.
The Emperor's demise is inevitable, Wrath. There's no use denying it.
You are mistaken, Gnost-Dural.
The Emperor has marked you. The life energy of your Jedi sect will fuel his rebirth.
Another servant. I should have known.
The complete Hand will never serve the Jedi.
You've failed.
I need no more servants to defeat your master.
Servant Twelve is right here. If you want her, turn your ship around and face me.
Come and get her.
You cannot tempt me.
Goodbye, Wrath. When the Emperor falls, you will thank me.
Enjoy your final days, Gnost-Dural.
Farewell. [Destroy projector]
Master, Gnost-Dural's ship has departed!
Observation: Master Gnost-Dural has jumped to hyperspace.
Jedi clan runs from battle!
The Jedi coward's long gone.
Gnost-Dural's gone. We were so close....
His ship's gone. No telling where.
Gnost-Dural has jumped to hyperspace, my lord.
No sign of Gnost-Dural's ship. He sure left in a hurry.
We must pursue and locate the Hand.
The station is primed for destruction, Wrath. Gnost-Dural's Jedi still defile our fortress, hunting for the Emperor's secrets.
Seal the Jedi in your fortress, and begin the countdown. Let Gnost-Dural feel his allies wiped out in the inferno.
Trap them to die in the blast.
Blast doors sealed; self-destruction engaged.
Gnost-Dural's allies may lead us to him. Sound the alarms, and let them escape the blast.
Give the Jedi time to flee.
Evacuation sirens active. Self-destruction engaged.
Begin the countdown. The strong will survive, and the weak will perish in the flames.
Let them fend for themselves.
Self-destruct engaged.
Time is short, Wrath. Hurry to your ship, and I will meet you there.
Restrain your emotions, Nataya. The Wrath feeds on your fear and anger.
I know secrets you can't even fathom, Jedi.
